lead_paragraph: Evan Fournier scored 25 points and Nikola Vucevic added 24 on Thursday night to lead the Orlando Magic past the Indiana Pacers 114-94.

headline.print_headline: Magic Pull Out All Tricks to Pull Away From Pacers 114-94
headline.main: Magic Pull Out All Tricks to Pull Away From Pacers 114-94

snippet: Evan Fournier scored 25 points and Nikola Vucevic added 24 on Thursday night to lead the Orlando Magic past the Indiana Pacers 114-94....
